about_the_game:
Silver Gold Collector:
The silver gold collector will automatically pickup gold that is dropped at faster intervals than the bronze gold collector to save you having to scroll over the gold when it's dropped, it's great for idle players

*The silver collector moves at a slower pace than the bronze collector and spawns more frequently thus collecting more gold

*Stacks with the Bronze Gold Collector and the Diamond Gold Collector so you can have up to 3 gold collectors running at once
